content: प्रकोपः {@--1@} Wrath, fury, rage, violent anger. {@--2@} Great excitement; provocation, irritation; उपदेशो हि मूर्खाणां प्रकोपाय न शांतये <ls>Pt. 1. 389.</ls> {@--3@} Insurrection, rebellion, mutiny; as in प्रकृति° popular disturbance. {@--4@} An attack. {@--5@} (<ab>Medic.</ab>) Excess, superabundance.
